description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The sequal to Gravity Dash. Change gravity to avoid old obstacles and new obstacles that may come your way. Play through all 15 new levels.
description.short: The sequal to Gravity Dash. Change gravity to avoid old obstacles and new obstacles that may come your way. Play through all 15 new levels.
